thread.title: Stewart Title Promotes Experienced Sales Director to Support Growth in Upper Midwest Region

author: cnbc.com
title: Stewart Title Promotes Experienced Sales Director to Support Growth in Upper Midwest Region
text:
HOUSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Bill Alvarez has been named Sales Director for Stewart’s Eastern United Sates and Upper Midwest direct operations. His expanded responsibilities will support the Direct Operations growth strategy in Minnesota, Nebraska, North Dakota, South Dakota and Wisconsin in addition to Northeast and Mid-Atlantic states.
Alvarez brings strong leadership and management experience to his expanded role. He will lead a comprehensive sales strategy that includes training and support for sales-focused associates, enhance Stewart’s visibility and generate additional revenue in the expanded territory.
“Bill brings a breadth of knowledge and expertise to the real estate industry, and in his expanded role as Sales Director, we will lean heavily on him to guide and increase our market share in his regions,” Group Senior Vice President, Marty Albertson said. “Stewart is a trusted leader in the title industry and positioned for growth, and Bill’s proven track record will guide our sales associates to succeed by strengthening relationships and growing revenue.”
He is based in Stewart’s office at 2022 Hwy 71, Spring Lake, NJ 07762. He can be reached at Bill.Alvarez@stewart.com .
About Stewart
Stewart Information Services Corporation (NYSE-STC) is a global real estate services company, offering products and services through our direct operations, network of Stewart Trusted Providers™ and family of companies. From residential and commercial title insurance and closing and settlement services to specialized offerings for the mortgage industry, we offer the comprehensive service, deep expertise and solutions our customers need for any real estate transaction. At Stewart, we believe in building strong relationships – and these partnerships are the cornerstone of every closing, every transaction and every deal. Stewart. Real partners. Real possibilities.™ More information is available at stewart.com , subscribe to the Stewart blog at blog.stewart.com , or follow Stewart on Twitter ® @stewarttitleco .
Trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
